title: Right or Wrong, Middle Aged Men Truth Be Told, Sick Food and more.
itunes:title: Right or Wrong, Middle Aged Men Truth Be Told, Sick Food and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! This is Steve Harvey Here Day! Ask him for anything but money. Tommy and Junior go head to head to see who is right or wrong. Middle aged men getting injured during sex is on the rise. Testimony time in church is not for everybody and Junior tells us why. Comedy Roulette brings us the things you say when you don't get a Valentine's Day gift. The fellas talk about the certain types of people that scare them for no reason. The Chief Love Officer has a mature lady writing in that has a special request. Do you remember the food that your mother would give you when you were sick as a kid? Today in Closing Remarks, Steve talks to us about this life of abundance that we are all qualified for.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
